org.objectweb.celtix.management
Interface InstrumentationManager

public interface InstrumentationManager

InstrumentationManager interface for the instrumentations query, register and unregister

Method Summary
 java.util.List<Instrumentation> getAllInstrumentation()
          get all instrumentation from the instrumentation manager
 javax.management.MBeanServer getMBeanServer()
          get the MBeanServer which will host the celtix runtime component MBeans NOTE: if the configuration is not set the JMXEnabled to be true, this method will return null
 void register(Instrumentation instrumentation)
          register the instrumentation instance to the instrumentation manager
 void shutdown()
          provide a clean up method for instrumentation manager to stop
 void unregister(java.lang.Object component)
          unregister the instrumentation instance from the instrumentation manager
